description: Some places in compute/manager.py log with the instance name and/or id instead of the instance's uuid. This could cause confusion when looking at the logs, making it difficult to track what is going on. We need to consistently use instance uuids
title: compute manager logs instance name and id instead of uuid

comments.content: Some places in compute/manager.py log with the instance name and/or id instead of the instance's uuid. This could cause confusion when looking at the logs, making it difficult to track what is going on. We need to consistently use instance uuids
